items.text: short of length outside off, Zhuwao goes back and punches it uppishly through covers for another boundary in the region
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Zhuwao, FOUR runs

items.text: length ball, Zhuwao looks to hit straight this time but ends up playing the wrong line, the ball goes over the off stump
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Zhuwao, no run

items.text: Zhuwao repeats the shot but gets an outside edge this time which goes over the slip cordon
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Zhuwao, 1 run

items.text: length ball around off stump and Masakadza dispatches it nonchalantly to the square leg fence
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Masakadza, FOUR runs

items.text: length ball, coming in with the angle and beats the bat to rap Masakadza on the thigh, was heading down though
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Masakadza, no run

items.text: length outside off, Masakadza gets on his toes and punches it to the left of the mid-off fielder for a quick single
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Masakadza, 1 run

items.preText: Jahangir Alam: "none is making comment? Where is khan?? " -- Hardly anyone, Jahangir
items.text: length ball, around middle and leg, defended on the leg side
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Masakadza, no run

items.text: use of feet this time to drive it straight, the ball bounces over the bowler's head before mid-off cuts it off
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Masakadza, 1 run

items.text: length outside off, goes for the sweep but fails to make contact. He was looking to smash it
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Zhuwao, no run

items.text: arm-ball this time, cramping the batsman for the room who blocks it on the off side
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Zhuwao, no run

items.text: use of feet this time to chip it over the infield and it sails over the deep midwicket fence
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Zhuwao, SIX runs

items.text: in the arc, out of the park. It was full, around off and Zhuwao lofts it over long-on for the second six of the over
items.shortText: Mehidy Hasan Miraz to Zhuwao, SIX runs

items.preText: borhan: "They look over confidant, Time for wicket to fall "
items.text: length outside off, Masakadza pushes at it and gets beaten
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Masakadza, no run

items.text: length ball, punches it towards mid-on and sets off for a quick single, a direct hit would have been closes
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Masakadza, 1 run

items.text: length ball from around the stumps, hardly any room for Zhuwao who was caught at the crease, a thick inside edge goes past the stumps and beats the man at short fine leg
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Zhuwao, FOUR runs

items.preText: khan: "Big Ham going to score a 100 ?"
items.text: length ball, around middle and leg, pushed towards mid-on
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Zhuwao, 1 run

items.preText: Md Rezaur Rahma: "Zim is clearly favourite here "
items.text: back of length outside off, defended
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Masakadza, no run

items.text: length outside off, sixth stump line, left alone
items.shortText: Mashrafe Mortaza to Masakadza, no run

items.preText:
And here is Fizz...

Tendai Nyabadza: "@borhan that moment when you try to jinx it then bang it's boundaries galore "

eddie: "Bring on the Fizz! Bowled really well against ZIM last tour."

Shuv: "Ban must bring fizz on!!!"
items.text: but starts with a leg side wide
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Zhuwao, 1 wide

items.text: bowled him! Length ball, comes back off the pitch and sneaks in through the gap between the bat and the pad to send the off stump cartwheeling
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Zhuwao, OUT

dismissal.text: C Zhuwao  b Mustafizur Rahman 35 (24b 4x4 2x6) SR: 145.83

items.preText: Brendan Taylor is the new man in
items.text: length ball, came slower off the wicket, Taylor almost ends up chipping it back
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Taylor, no run

items.text: length ball, angling across, defended towards cover
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Taylor, no run

items.text: length ball, angling away, left alone
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Taylor, no run

items.preText: Anjum: "@khan, you done it again, you should buy lottery today as it's your day :)"
items.text: back of length outside off, Taylor stays back and defends it towards cover
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Taylor, no run

items.preText: Jackson Chindow: "It was a wise decision to replace Mire with Cephas"
items.text: Was in the air but away from the bowler, it was a bit fuller this time, Taylor was looking to play it towards covers but closes the face of the bat early. As a result the ball goes in the direction of the non-striker, there was a chance of the second run but batsmen decide against it
items.shortText: Mustafizur Rahman to Taylor, 1 run
